did.unittitle: League for Industrial Democracy Pamphlets 1905-1955
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pamphlets from the League for Industrial Democracy

processinfo.p: Pamphlet are mostly arraigned alphabetically by author. A few are filed by title. The original arrangement had empty folders for possible future pamphlets. The empty folders were retained in the collection.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: League for Industrial Democracy Pamphlets #5266. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
